Description: Amount of energy (in kWh) available for charging operations within the node.
Amount of energy (in kWh) available for discharging operations within the node.
Maximum Active power (in kW) that can be used for charging at the node level.
Maximum active power (in kW) that can be delivered during discharge at the node level.
Maximum reactive power (in kVAr) that can be used for lagging at the node level.
Maximum reactive power (in kVAr) that can be delivered for leading at the node level.
State of Charge: percentage of remaining battery capacity for the entire node.
State of Health: indicator of overall battery health for the node compared to original state.
Real power (in kW) currently being delivered or consumed by the node.
Currently active setpoint for active power.
Reactive power (in kVAR) currently associated with the node’s operation.
Currenty active setpoint for reactive power.
Power consumed internally by the node for auxiliary systems and PLC operation.
Average temperature of all cells across containers managed by the node.
Minimum cell temperature recorded across all containers under the node.
Maximum cell temperature recorded across all containers under the node.
Total number of full charge/discharge cycles completed by the node.
Round Trip Efficiency: ratio of energy discharged to energy charged for the entire plant.
Current status of all input/output signals managed by the node’s PLC.
Status information from BMZ battery modules integrated into the node.
Collection of Node errors, also containing comm issues
